data.message: Don't care about both! SNL is a liberal shit show and Eminem can crawl back into the hole he came from

replies.message: Then why comment in the first place 🤔
Eminem in fact is not live in a hole like you do. Eminem lives in a mansion from all the money being made from being the top rapper of all times

I don't understand how people come on "Eminem's Fan page" and comment shit like this,if your not a fan why the hell would u comment on his page he didn't sponsor it,so it's obviously for people who are fans not non fans !!

James Roy Why do I give a shit?? He hides in his mansion while he cries about letting terrorists in when he has security protecting him!! He is such a hypocrite it's incredible! I said something because it's my right to do so and if you don't like it too bad! They are all hypocrites and you and all of them are part of the problems of this world!!! He is a drug addict who sings about rape, drugs and all the bad things you libs like! If you don't like my comment then be quiet! I am entitled to say what I want!
So why follow him on social media??
Kathryn Henderson Goodenough Do you think I do?? Of course I don't I saw this disgusting human come up on my fb wall not wanted I can assure you
It doesn’t come up if you don’t click like on Eminem stuff or SNL stuff. That’s how Facebook works Lori
Adam Hennad It comes up on the wall brainiac!! I had been an eminem fan in the past and didn't unlike the page my mistake! Believe me don't want any more of this crap on my wall again!!

Miranda Moore Yeah it's you libs! Mindless sheep snowflakes as you can see here nobody can keep their mouth shut if you don't agree with them! only libs attack someone for having an opinion. Don't like it too bad. I didn't ask for your opinion

Lori Martorello-Grande You seem so damn Internet tough...

But if you want to talk shit, do it in person!

6 R**** Dr

We got phone numbers too, so why don’t you just move along.
I'm a republican you dumbass 😂 I don't like Trump though. But you just don't see the irony of how offended Marshall makes you when Republicans always put down Dems and Liberals for "being offended"
The fact you don't see the irony and hypocrisy is sad yet hysterical 😂😭
Robert Cherry Whatever Another violent lib what a shock
Yet here you are
Go cry somewhere else dumb slut
So much irony with this classless bimbo 😂
It looks like Lori has been triggered. ❄❄❄
Lol violent lib. Hey Lori Martorello-Grande wasn't it a conservative white supremacist asshole who ran counter protesters over in Charlottesville and killed a woman? 🤔🤔

Lori Martorello-Grande isn't too bright, is she? Not surprised given she's a mindless sheep who follows Donald "Grab em By the Pussy" Trump. Hey Lori, how does it feel to be a degenerate?? Just curious.
